name: entity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 something that exists apart from other things, having its own independent existence: The museums work closely together, but are separate legal entities. He regarded the north of the country as a separate cultural entity.

something that exists apart from other things, having its own independent existence: Although the two buildings are in separate locations, the museum they are part of is a single entity.

an organization or a business that has its own separate legal and financial existence: Nearly 90 entities, mainly private companies, mint gold in bars. a commercial/corporate entity a private/public entity a small/large entity an independent/separate/single entity See also
business entity
legal entity
